title: Skin Leona unknown
body:
I've found in game in my team a Leona with a beautiful skin called...he/she told me"protector Leona". 
I'm not able to find it neither on youtube...WHY????
Where is? Where can i buy it or find it?

replies.body:
First: you have posted the same post twice, pls remove one of them

Second: this is the italina forum, so if you aren't italian go to the english forum or if you are italian, WRITE IN ITALIAN

Third: i think the skin you are asking for counld be iron solari leona, defender leona or valchirye leona, or go here http://gameinfo.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/leona/ , here there are all the official skins released for leona
